Description:
Notice HS/20220323/FPH01 / 312375037 - IN served - You have failed to ensure that measures are taken which are effective to prevent access to the Correa large bed horizontal mill because the enclosure doors preventing access to the chuck or rotating tool have been removed.

Notice HS/20220323/FPH02 / 312375060  - IN served - You have not made and given effect to suitable arrangements appropriate for the effective monitoring and maintenance of water-mix metalworking fluids.
